title: DoDo and the smellometer
creator_contributor_role: Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television series
description: Episode number 60 of Series "DoDo: the kid from outer space". DoDo is a kid with extraordinary powers, and he knows how to use them. When he arrives on earth, DoDo has a series of adventures with Compy the Computer Bird and Professor Fingers, who can invent anything. From Hollywood to Loch Ness, from the Pyramids to Paris, DoDo and his pals have fun at the movies, help Interpol capture some spies, find sunken treasure, visit a rodeo and still have time to keep the world from being sold. In this episode DoDo captures the thieves of a valuable painting by means of a unique "smellometer". Animated by Harold Whitaker, John Smith, Tony Whitehouse, Tony Guy, Bruno Bozzetto, Arthur Humberstone.
related_objects: Series; S01463; Dodo, the kid from outer space; Active; 1964
